trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Switch to an annual plan, and get all the same benefits at 50% less than the monthly plan:
trans-unit.target: Passe a un plan anuâl e oten ducj i stes vantaçs cuntun sparagn dal 50% rispiet al plan mensîl:

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Protezion par un massim di 5 dispositîfs

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Plui di 500 servidôrs in plui di 30 paîs

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Nissune limitazion ae largjece di bande

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: No logging of your network activity
trans-unit.target: Nissune regjistrazion de tô ativitât in rêt

trans-unit.source: Get the same protection, for half the price.
trans-unit.target: Oten la stesse protezion a metât presit.

trans-unit.source: Save 50% when you switch to an annual plan
trans-unit.target: Sparagne il 50% cuant che tu passis a un plan anuâl
